line_1: Where thick damp walls this raging heat repress;
line_2: O for some secret shady cool recess!

line_1: Weak is the aid of wisdom to repress
Nor quite indulges, nor can quite repress.
line_2: As some coy Nymph her Lover's warm Address

line_1: Let but my bliss their fond complaints repress,
line_2: Oh, spouse adored! and in full happiness

line_1: Let but my bliss their fond complaints repress,
line_2: This love-contented heart its solitude shall bless.
Her hair, which floated o'er her dress,

line_1: Constrain'd his strong compunctions to repress;
line_2: Of nurturing care, and smiling tenderness,

line_1: Constrain'd his strong compunctions to repress;
line_2: With secret scourges arm'd those griefly faitours press.
